div.p: Helpful and educational resources for your children during school closure.
During this time of school closure, DCSD will be keeping you updated at the following sites:

div.h3:
When you get, GIVE.
When you learn, TEACH.

Education is the most powerful weapon which
you can use to change the world

div.p: Delta County School District does not unlawfully discriminate on the basis of race, color, sex, religion, national origin, ancestry, creed, age, marital status, sexual orientation, genetic information, disability or need for special education services in admissions, access to, treatment, or employment in educational programs or activities which it operates. For more information please view our nondiscrimination policy.
